name: The Curse of Lancaster Manor
description:
You are the young niece of a recently deceased sorcerer. After planting his tooth and obtaining his skull, he instructs you to break back into the castle, to retrieve his heart in order to resurrect him. But beware, ghouls and ghosts haunt the manor, guarding his heart to prevent him from returning.

A cute and spooky adventure game about odd distant relatives and the strange things you do for family. Lots of hidden content so be sure to click around.

Created by: Pencilz 
Music by: Sneetric
